import React from 'react' import {BrowserRouter as Router,Routes,Route,Link} from 'react-router-dom' import Navbar from 'react-bootstrap/Navbar' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Nav from 'react-bootstrap/Nav' import Typed from 'typed.js' import Home from './Home' function App() { // Create reference to store the DOM element containing the animation const el = React.useRef(null); // Create reference to store the Typed instance itself const typed = React.useRef(null); React.useEffect(() => { const options = { strings: [ 'Code', 'Debug', 'Ankit Saikia ``', 'A dev ``', 'Anime', 'AI', 'Audio', 'Android', 'Animation', 'Automation', 'Java', 'Coding', 'Github ``', 'Game Development', 'Kotlin', 'JavaScript', 'nodeJS', 'NPM', 'Ruby', 'C++', 'Python', 'C', 'CSS', 'HTML5', 'PHP', 'React', 'Vue', 'Iconic', 'Web Development', 'Photoshop', '3D Design', 'Web Design', 'House Designs', 'Video Editing', 'Database', ], smartBackspace: true, stringsElement: null, startDelay: 2, fadeOut: false, backSpeed: 30, typeSpeed: 40, shuffle: false, backDelay: 1500, loop: true, cursorChar: null, }; // elRef refers to the rendered below typed.current = new Typed(el.current, options); return () => { // Make sure to destroy Typed instance during cleanup // to prevent memory leaks typed.current.destroy(); } }, []) return ( {/* dark navbar */}
Web Blogs Hire Me
}/> ); } export default App;
